card.name: Heirophant Green
card.text: QR: Ranged, Mid-Range Q: Dispel any non-anonymous Disguise in the field. Q2UR: Become a Trap with Invisibility. Anyone who moves in this field may be attacked by Heirophant Green at no cost.

card.name: Silver Chariot (SC)
card.text: First Strike May Redirect any ranged attack it can block against. Q: Gain +1/0/-1. Recast to remove. May not recast this turn. B: Suprise Ranged, Mid Range Projectile Persists. Silver Chariot may not attack or block until it is Retrieved. Disappears when Silver Chariot leaves the field.

card.name: Star Platinum (SC)
card.text: Enhanced Vision Attack Rush SU: Unblockable Ranged, Close Range Use only when Star Platinum is Immobilized

card.name: Cameo
card.text: (Trickster)

card.name: Deep Blue Moon
card.text:
While Deep Blue Moon is in Water, gain +1/0/+1, and May forcibly move my attacked target.
B: Target, Close Range Attach Barnacles to target character, applying 0/-1/-1.
BBR: All characters in combat or entering combat this turn take Unblockable Damage, and cannot Retreat.

card.name: Empress
card.text: Empress must deploy bound to a target unit at Close Range it may not take actions until specified. Empress gains a Progress Counter at the start of each turn, and its base Speed, Power, and Toughness are equal to its progress. 1 — May treat the attached character as a targetable ally. 2 — May Interact and Attack. 3 — Gains Unblockable versus the bound unit. If the bound unit dies, gain all suppressed abilities.

card.name: Forever
card.text: (Lecher?)

card.name: Geb's N'Doul
card.text:
Long Distance Disguise
Blind Enhanced Hearing

card.name: Gray Fly
card.text: (Deranged?)

card.name: Hanged Man
card.text: May bind to any object with Reflective, including a character’s eyes, and Windows. While bound, has Immaterial and Unblockable. When the bound object becomes invalid, may Move to a new bound object at Rapid speed. Can always Dodge an attack, unless the attacker has Knowledge.

card.name: Hol Horse
card.text: Buffoon

card.name: Justice
card.text:
“Fog”
Whenever a character takes damage, you may take Control of the injured body part.

card.name: Mannish Boy
card.text: (Child)

card.name: Midler
card.text: (Lecher?)

card.name: Rubber Soul
card.text: Can always fully block attacks, as long as Rubber Soul can Breathe.

card.name: Strength
card.text:
Strength may only be deployed on top of a Water field. It replaces that card while it is on the field.
B: Attack, Long Range May pay B to Immobilize defender on hit.

card.name: Tower of Gray
card.text: Every time Tower of Gray deals damage, it gains a level of Power.

card.name: The World
card.text: Attack Rush SB: Add an ability counter to The World, equal to Power. While this counter is present, no action may be taken by anyone besides The World, unless it is Immune to Stopped Time. Reduce this counter by one each time The World takes an action.

card.name: Anubis
card.text: When this object is Interacted with, gain Control of the interacting character as long as they are holding this object. Whenever this character is targeted by an enemy ability, is gains the ability to Interrupt that ability, except this time. Whenever this character is blocked or blocks, it gains +1 S/P. G: Use only when on the ground. Attract an enemy or Civilian, and force them to Grab this object. G: Cause the holder to Interact. Use only if they do not have Knowledge of this Stand.

card.name: Bastet's Mariah
card.text: May summon a Small Stand Object with “On Interact, apply one stack of Magnetism”. Characters with 2+ of Magnetism are Grouped, and their Moves can be Interrupted by enemies. Characters take damage each turn for each stack of Magnetism over 2.

card.name: Cream
card.text: This stand may Devour its user, granting them and itself Immaterial, Hidden, and Blind. While devoured, the user can Peek, exposing itself and allowing attacks to be targeted. Cream’s Attacks are Unblockable and have Deletion.

card.name: Death Thirteen
card.text: When characters start their turn Isolated, Escaped, or Unconscious, they gain a stack of Dreaming. This ability then resolves for all affected characters as a Dreaming phase. Dreaming phase - Each character suffers an Attack of Opportunity, with Disadvantage equal to their stacks. If a character falls Unconscious with their stand active, it gains Hidden and may act immediately after the Dreaming phase. Death Thirteen may only be attacked during these phases.

card.name: Geb
card.text:
This Stand is Water.
Piercing

card.name: Joseph Joestar (SC)
card.text: Hamon User QR: Target, Close Range Immobilize target unit May spend R to deal Unblockable Damage to bound enemy. Q: Choose one — • Dispel any target Disguise. • Create an object from the field, in a random enemy’s backline. The object has an Anonymity disguise, and Joseph has Knowledge of it. • Grant Vision of a target until Joseph takes another action.

card.name: Judgement
card.text: BG: Target enemy. Summon a copy of a dead character, with no abilities. Only one copy per character. The copy has Unblockable against the target. Use once per turn.

card.name: Kenny G.
card.text: Tenore Sax - May play and modify Field cards at Instant speed. (Expand usual field limits?)

card.name: Khnum's Oingo
card.text: G: Choose one: - Gain a Comrade Disguise - Gain a Civilian Disguise (Revise to work with Toth plotline)

card.name: The Lovers
card.text:
When unattached, The Lovers may not be targeted without Enhanced Senses.
The Lovers may Attach to a target character, becoming untargetable. Whenever the user takes damage, that much damage +1 is taken by the bound character. Pain counts as 0 damage. At the beginning of each turn The Lovers is bound, create a token with Duplicate Disguise, permanently bound to the same character.

card.name: Magician's Red
card.text:
U: Incinerate an incoming ranged attack.
SR: Ranged, Mid Range Ignite. May pay G to Redirect any number of times, as long as you have control.
S: Create a Fragile follower that has Reveal all enemy positions.

card.name: Pet Shop
card.text:
(More text for agility and behavior)
BR: Ranged, Mid Range Ice. May spend X additional mana to perform X additional attacks simultaneously.

card.name: Set's Alessi
card.text:
Citizen Disguise
BR: Surprise, Close-Range No damage. If hit or blocked, the target becomes a D/D/D Child, losing all unique abilities, while this stand is active. If the target is already a child, it is Destroyed.

card.name: The Sun
card.text:
Indestructible
At the beginning of each turn, add a progress counter to The Sun. Every character suffers Heat, and takes damage equal to the progress minus their Toughness.
